name: CHOMP (Sam McCreery, limeopolis, Jessss1, Jammabamma98)
description:
You are a peaceful shadow monster, but nosey kids have invaded your favourite haunt! Gobble them up, but avoid their deadly torchlight!

Controls

  • WASD/arrow keys/left stick/D-pad - Walk
  • Left click/E/A (XBox)/X (PlayStation) - Eat

Our first time using Godot engine :)
